text: Temane kahyum ke basa! Have tamara para allaha taraphathi yatana ane gus'so avavano ja che, sum tame marathi te namo vise jhaghado karo cho, jene tame ane tamara bapa-dada'o'e rakhya che, te'ona pujya hovana ko'i purava allaha'e nathi utarya, to tame raha ju'o, hum pana tamari sathe raha jo'i rahyo chum
